  • Plants have 2x their normal Appeal

bronze_sword.description: Basic, but better than fighting with a sharpened stick!

giant_bone_axe_iconic.description: Carved from the clavicle of some great beast.

long_sword.description: Sharp, with extra reach. A faithful weapon.

short_sword.description: Stubby, but its steel blade keeps an edge.

two_handed_sword.description: Double the hands, double the trouble. (Two-handed)

two_handed_sword_iconic.description: Double the hands, double the trouble.

wooden_sword.description: Thacks thine enemies with oaken might

wooden_sword_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Footman.

bow.description: Used by an archer for shooting arrows

recurve_bow.description: Curved for faster and stronger shots

small_healing_tonic.description: Used by the herbalist to heal small wounds

coarse_bandage.description: Used by the herbalist to heal for a small amount

heavy_bandage.description: Used by the herbalist to provide a lot of healing.

turnip_seeds.description: Learn to grow the mighty turnip.
